summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ForaTask multi-tenant SaaS application. Fixed a backend bug in task discussion comments. All critical frontend and backend functionality working correctly.

issues: Shows only 2 team members - admin may need to see all 3 seeded users (admin, supervisor, employee)

bugs_fixed.issue: Discussion comment API returning 500 error - invalid notification type 'comment' not in enum
bugs_fixed.fix: Changed notification type from 'comment' to 'system' which is a valid enum value

frontend_ui: Login page loads with all form elements
Login with seeded admin credentials redirects to dashboard
Dashboard shows stats (Total Tasks, In Progress, Completed, Overdue)
Sidebar navigation links (Dashboard, Tasks, Chat, Attendance, Team)
Tasks page with Team/Self filter toggle
Tasks page with status filters (All, Pending, In Progress, Completed, Overdue, For Approval)
Task Create page with multi-location increment/decrement controls
Team page shows members list with Add Member button (admin view)
Attendance page shows today's status and check-in/out button
Chat page loads with New Chat button
Task Detail page with 4 tabs (Details, Locations, Timeline, Discussion)
Discussion tab with comment input and send button

critical_code_review_comments: Notification model enum is limited - consider adding 'comment' and 'mention' types for better notification categorization
React Router future flag warnings suggest upgrading to v7 patterns
seed_data_creation: Backend tests created TEST_* prefixed tasks with multi-location support
context_for_next_testing_agent: All critical features working. Discussion comment bug was fixed. Multi-location task creation and viewing works. All 3 seeded users can log in. The notification model may need enum updates if more specific notification types are needed.
